author: Duplicate jbboutte
post_text: March 25, 2019 at 9:28 PM#1Hi !I've recorded a timecode, assign to a sequence.then I copied the sequence to another one to work on it because the opérator need the desk.Now, I'm trying to link the new one one the original timecode.It is possible ?See you !

posts.author: Duplicate jbboutte
posts.post_text: March 25, 2019 at 9:28 PM#1Hi !I've recorded a timecode, assign to a sequence.then I copied the sequence to another one to work on it because the opérator need the desk.Now, I'm trying to link the new one one the original timecode.It is possible ?See you !

posts.author: bullock
posts.post_text: March 25, 2019 at 11:03 PM#2Assuming you have built TCs in the pool, rather than in Seq Assign, open your TC in the editor, click on the relevant Exec 1.x.x, then Track Functions, Change Exec/Fader and select the new sequence

posts.author: Duplicate jbboutte
posts.post_text: March 26, 2019 at 5:34 PM#3Brilliant Bullock !It was what I looking for !Thanks !

title: Assign timecode to another sequence
